main event: A witness observed a large, round, luminous object hovering over some trees near their home in Longmont, Colorado on July 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object had no visible means of propulsion and appeared to be between 30 and 40 feet in diameter.
After observing the object for 30 minutes, it suddenly darted straight up into the sky at a terrific speed and disappeared from sight.
The witness reported there were no sound effects associated with the object.
The witness is considered a reliable person and their report is considered credible by investigators.
Another witness reported seeing an oval-shaped object with a honeycomb pattern on its surface in Longmont, Colorado on the same date.
sighted object: Large, round, luminous object; oval-shaped object with honeycomb pattern
witnesses: Private citizens, adult male and female
